definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: The recent publications in Komsomolskaya Pravda has come in handy.
sentences.chinese: 最近的出版物在共青團真理報已經派上用場。

sentences.english: In the spring of1912 Pravda was brought out.
sentences.chinese: 在1912年春天《真理報》出刊了。
